title: Announcement, "Review Committee Selections: Joan Bontempo, Michael McGillis, Deanna Sperka, Paul Stewart", 1988
title_raw: Review Committee Selections: Joan Bontempo, Michael McGillis, Deanna Sperka, Paul Stewart
signed: Signature imprinted in black ink, verso, left edge, center, running upward, sideways: Design: Edward Fella, Agenda, late 88
inscribed:
Recto: Imprinted in black, across upper edge, center: Review Committee Selections/ September 9 - October 8, 1988/ Opening: Friday,/ September 9, 5:00 - 8:30 PM/ The Review Committee 87/88; running upward, sideways: Pi Benio/ Larry Cressman/ Tom Paul Fitzgerald/ Douglas Warner/ Mary Preston/ Mary Brecht Stephenson; across upper right edge, running downward, sideways: Selections are the following:; across lower half of sheet, center: Joan  Bontempol/ Michael McGillis/ Deanna Sperka/ Paul Stewart; across lower left edge, running upward, sideways: DETROIT/ FOCUS; running downward, sideways: GALLERY/ 643 Beaubien, 3rd Floor Detroit, Michigan 48226; diagonally across lower left quadrant, running upward: Gallery Hours:/ Wednesday-Saturday/ Noon-6 p.m.; across lower left corner: (313) 962-9025
Verso: Imprinted in black diagonally across sheet, from lower left quadrant to upper right quadrant: Detroit/ Focus/ gallery; across lower left quadrant: Detroit Focus allery Across from the Bricktown People Mover Station/ 743 Beaubien 3rd Floor/ Detroit, Michigan/ 48226; across lower left corner, running upward, sideways: With the support of:/ The National Endowment for the Arts/ The Michigan Council for the Arts/ The Detroit Council for the Arts; across lower right quadrant: Nonprofit Org./ Bulk Rate/ U.S. Postage/ PAID/ Detroit, Michigan/ Permit No. 2960
description:
Poster announcement printed in black for Detroit Focus Gallery exhibition, designed to be mailed.  [Printed] hand-lettered text in a variety of sizes, styles, throughout. 
Recto:  Across upper edge, center, surrownded by a rectangle, text giving exhibition title, dates, reception, and additional information.  Upper right quadrant, black square.  Across lower half of sheet, text giving participating artists, location, and contact information. Verso: Upper left quadrant, black square.  Diagonally across sheet, "Detroit Focus gallery." Center, left, abstract doodle.  Lower left quadrant, vertical rectangle surrounding text giving sponsors, return address.  Across lower half of sheet, horizontal rectangle, left blank for address.  Lower right quadrant, vertical rectangle surrounding text giving postage information.

tombstone.epitaph: Announcement, "Review Committee Selections: Joan Bontempo, Michael McGillis, Deanna Sperka, Paul Stewart", 1988. Offset lithograph on gray paper.. Gift of Edward Fella. 1995-42-22.
